staking.title: Stake
staking.description: Long-term staking incentivizes users to extend the staking period through block rewards, and the incentive amount is directly proportional to the staking duration.
staking.alertDescription: You can deposit or withdraw staking at any time, with no lock-in period, and block rewards are distributed every 12 hours
staking.unstakeDescription: The pledged principal will be released linearly according to the block. Users can withdraw the unlocked portion at any time, while continuing to enjoy the increased returns on the remaining principal.
staking.unstakeInfo: You may unstake the released staking amount at any time. If remaining staked, these funds will continue to generate block rewards.
staking.claimDescription: Claim your staking rewards and rebase boost. Rewards will be sent directly to your wallet address.
staking.claimInfo: You may claim rebase rewards at any time. lf unclaimed, these rewards willautomatically compound and continue to generate additional rebase rewards.
staking.recordsDescription: You can view your staking records here.
staking.noRecords: Please connect your wallet or enter a wallet address to view the detailed statistics
